text: Ana khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu mbe sɨgi shogap ntan ofari ga mbuav, fhura bigir vhuuin ndu ndɨɨi, nta tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ndu mbe za mpooi shiav za gɨri ofari gum, tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨ zav sɨgi shogap, nta vɨzir ofari ga mbui, nta vhɨra tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mba Moses suaŋgi tɨvi khaŋ mbe nzuai, mbe nta zɨn ŋgɨrga. Ndu guigira nta gari nta tuktɨgi fhuvara. Nta guigira ndun vuzvuga nɨɨŋge fhuvara.”
